name: Snorlax
flavorText:
Very lazy. Just
eats and sleeps.
As its rotund bulk builds, it
becomes steadily
more slothful.

previous.name: Aerodactyl
previous.flavorText:
A Pokémon that roamed the skies
in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are
like saw blades.

next.name: Articuno
next.flavorText:
A legendary bird
POKéMON that is
said to appear to doomed people who
are lost in icy
mountains.

pokemon.name: Munchlax
pokemon.flavorText:
It wolfs down its weight in food
once a day, swallowing food whole
with almost no chewing.
